main.title: BOHDAN SIDOROV
main.text: Full stack JavaScript developer with specialization in React and NodeJS. Experienced above 1 year of creating sites and building responsive and user-friendly web applications

about-me.title: About me
about-me.description1: Passionate and creative full stack developer with over 1 year of experience in building responsive and user-friendly web applications. Specialize in building frontend on React and have experience developing backend on ExpressJS. Proficient in REST API and SSR development using Java and PHP and ml based systems on Python.
about-me.master: Master degree in Software Engineering, National Technical University of Ukraine “Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute” on fifth year.
about-me.bachelor: Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering, National Technical University of Ukraine “Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institute”.
